#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int amount;
	cin >> amount;
	for (int i = 0; i < amount; i++) {
		char word[101] = { 0 };
		cin >> word;
		int holes = 0;
		for (int j = 0; j < 100; j++) {
			if (word[j] == 'A' || word[j] == 'D' || word[j] == 'O' || word[j] == 'P' || word[j] == 'R' || word[j] == 'Q') {
				holes++;
			}
			else if (word[j] == 'B') {
				holes += 2;
			}
		}
		cout << holes << endl;
	}
	cin >> amount;
	return 0;
}
